name: internship-housing-tips
description: Students trade Bay Area sublet advice and share budget spreadsheets.

events.content: Need housing tips for a summer internship in Sunnyvale. Trying not to spend my entire stipend.
Try fb.com/groups/bayareasummerhousing. Also check out company bulletin boards—some offer $1500 housing stipends if you ask.
Dropping the spreadsheet we used last summer: https://tinyurl.com/csc-housing-budget. Tabs for utilities + commute costs.
You’re the best. Diving in now.
